text:
## Overview

In this section, you'll find basic guides to help you get started with Weaviate.

## Prerequisites

Before reading these guides, we recommend you read the Quickstart Tutorial, which will help you familiarize yourself with the basics of Weaviate.

## Guides

- Which Weaviate setup to use?: Find the right Weaviate setup for your needs.
- Bring your own vectors: How to use your own vectors with Weaviate.
- Generative search (RAG): Guide to performing generative search (also called retrieval augmented generation, or RAG) with Weaviate.
name: weaviate-starter-guides
